statements: DELETE FROM experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM observations WHERE id = 100 AND observation_date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date < '2022-06-15' AND id IN (SELECT experiment_id FROM observations WHERE observation_date < '2022-06-01');
DELETE FROM experiment_results WHERE experiment_id = (SELECT experiment_id FROM observation_data WHERE experiment_name = 'Sample Experiment');
DELETE FROM study_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' AND data_value > 100.00;
